titles.title: Home Office Deduction Simplification Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a standard home office deduction.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/11/2011--Introduced. Home Office Deduction Simplification Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a taxpayer who uses a residence to conduct a trade or business a standard tax deduction equal to the lesser of $1,500 or the taxpayer's gross trade or business income derived from the business use of such residence.
